agents.name: Email Scanner Agent
agents.description: Scans Gmail for emails containing delegation keywords (urgent, team, delegate), extracts task title, description, priority, context, and parses teammate assignments from @mentions

agents.name: Slack Notifier Agent
agents.description: Composes and sends personalized Slack messages to designated teammates with complete task details including title, description, priority level, and background context

agents.name: Task Delegation Manager
agents.description: Coordinates email scanning and Slack notification workflow, aggregates delegation results and provides summary of tasks assigned
